Reviews.Content: Not good Although the staff are extremely pleasant and helpful the hotel itself has seen better days.No hot water tap on the basin in the bathroom, had to buy a small bucket to transfer hot water from the shower for my shave in the morning.
Reviews.Author: jeffsoo1
